title: Computer-Based Simulation Utilized Pharmacy Practical Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online course combining computer simulations and LMS for practical pharmacy training for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain medication administration methods and precautions through patient counseling scenarios in a simulation environment.
Learners can identify drug interactions and potential side effects with over 80% accuracy through prescription review simulations.
Learners can perform medication dispensing and patient education processes with over 90% accuracy in a virtual pharmacy environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
